column9:
Thank you for your email.

I am currently out of the office on Annual Leave until Monday 13th September.

If you email is in relation to a new or existing booking  please contact Front Office Manager - Karen Kotz on 08 8267 3033 or meridienfom@countryclubs.com.au

For any urgent or management related matters  please contact our Group General Manager - Kirsty Ackland on 08 8267 3397 or kirsty@countryclubs.com.au
Any other non-urgent matters will be actioned upon my return to the office. Thank you for your patience.


Kind Regards.


Fiona Hehir
General Manager
Adelaide Meridien Hotel & Apartments.
Country Club Hotels & Resorts          
www.countryclubs.com.au
